Interface SalesFormatter

All Known Implementing Classes:
HTMLSalesFormatter, PlainTextSalesFormatter, XMLSalesFormatter
public interface SalesFormatter

This interface defines a method that obtains a string representation of a Sales object.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
iCarnegie
See Also:
Sales

Method Summary
 String formatSales(Sales sales)
          Obtains a string representation of the specified sales information.
